data.text:
Gauhati University Course and Fees Structure

If you are planning for an admission in the Gauhati University, you must at first gather knowledge about the Gauhati University courses and fees. The eminent educational institution offers a wide variety of under graduation and post-graduation courses in various disciplines in the field of Engineering, Management, Commerce, Humanities & Arts, Mass Media & Communications, Medical, Law, Computer Application, Education, and Science. The Guwahati University fee structure is reasonable allowing the students belonging from every economic stratum to afford it.

Gauhati University courses offered at the UG level with various disciplines. It has Bachelor in Arts degree with specialisations in Anthropology, Bodo and Geography. It also offers courses like LLB, BA+ LLB, B.com and many more. If you wish to pursue legal courses, you need to pass your HSC exam from an eminent Board with the relevant subjects. Whatever academic course you opt for the Guwahati University fees structure is available at the University website, you can visit it and draw an idea about the same.

Looking for Guwahati University courses and fees? Remember that the institute also offers M.A. degree with various fields on specialisation like Journalism and Mass Communication, Arabic, Assamese, Comparative English Literature, Bengali, Economics, History, Persian, Sanskrit, Women studies and more at cost-effective GU PG admission fees. The university also offers M.Phill in various subjects like Statistics, History, Education, French, History, Philosophy, Psychology, Sociology, Women studies, Linguistics etc.

It has M.Sc in Computer science, Electronics and communication, Geography, Chemistry, Mathematical Science, Chemical Science, Botany etc. M.com, MBA, MBA executive and several other master courses offered at the postgraduate level.

Other than these the University have Diploma courses in Russian and Persian. It offers post-graduation diploma in Disabilities Studies (PGDDS), French, Persian and Assamese. Duration for PGDDS is six months and for French, it is two years. Reach out to the institute for knowing in detail about the Gauhati University fee structure.

The university believes in strengthening its field of research by admitting brilliant students across the nation. It offers PhD courses in various disciplines like Arabic, Assamese, Bengali, Bodo, Economics, Education, English literature, English, French, Geography, Hindi, History, Sanskrit, Sociology etc.

Gauhati University has a separate department for Distance Education. Some of the Gauhati University IDOL courses are MA, MSc, MCom, MCJ etc. Interested in enrolling yourself in the MA courses? You must complete your graduation in the relevant stream from a renowned university. The rules and regulations to take admission in all these courses are stated on the official website at https://www.idolgu.in/academic/courses. Just click on the link and check out the Guwahati University MA admission fees.

The university also has certification courses in Modern Persian, Persian, Russian, Women studies with the duration of one year. The fee structure for these courses is mentioned below.
